text: Nde Fhe Bakɨmen kaav, “Darar” anan kaai. Mba Dara, ana nzan zɨri ga ndɨkndɨgap, nza garap, nza nzuav nzuai fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Ana nza mbui tɨvi garav, nta nzuav nza nzuai. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde zazera ntige kha nuianan kɨv, nde khueŋ kaŋgiri, kha nuian, ana guigira nzan ŋgu guar fhuvara. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde guigira Fhe Bakɨmen piin kɨri.
